# Indicativo Presente

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())


require(tidyverse)
require(writexl)
require(readxl)
require(lubridate)
require(tidyquant)
require(formattable)
require(kableExtra)
require(DT)


options(scipen=999)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
verbi1<-read_xlsx("prepwerkwoorden.xlsx",2)
qq<-dim(verbi1)[2]
```

## a - vervoeging

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}

pos=28
sel<-verbi1[1,pos]
werkw<-verbi1[11:16,pos]
dat1<-data.frame(verbi1$vertaling[11:16],verbi1$vnw[11:16],werkw)
deel1<-sel
deel2<-dat1
colnames(deel2)<-c("modus","vnw","vervoeging")
rownames(deel2)<-NULL
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
kable(deel1, booktabs=T) %>%
  kable_classic(full_width = F)%>%kable_paper("hover", full_width = F)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
kable(deel2, booktabs=T) %>%
  kable_classic(full_width = F)%>%kable_paper("hover", full_width = F)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
tabel1<-datatable(deel2,caption='a - vervoeging',filter='top',extensions = 'Buttons', options = list(
   dom = 'Bfrtip',
   buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'))
)
tabel1

```
